title: Sound On: Democrats Tax Proposal, Budget

description:
Guests: Allyson Versprille, Bloomberg tax reporter, Republican Congressman French Hill, Lester Munson, Principal at government relations firm, BGR Group, and Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.
